title: For Liberty
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706222346im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Ron%20Paul%20Poster_3493.png)
  
I called my dad today to talk to him about how monetary policy is the biggest problem we currently face as a country. We talked for a while. Then I decided it was time to get along with this pet project Iâ€™d been working on; making a Ron Paul wordmark. Any suggestions for the type below it?
author: David Sudweeks
